FuncDef:
The cmp-request server url command specifies the URL address of a CMPv2 server.
The undo cmp-request server url command deletes the URL address of a CMPv2 server. The cmp-request server url command specifies the URL address of a CMPv2 server. The undo cmp-request server url command deletes the URL address of a CMPv2 server. By default, the URL of a CMPv2 server is not configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the entering of URLs in the ASCII code.
-

Specifies the URL of the CMPv2 server.
The value is a string starting with http:// and consisting of 1 to 128 case-insensitive characters without spaces.
